thrill.name: Sky Drop
thrill.description: A free-fall drop tower that gives you a breathtaking view before plummeting down at high speeds.

thrill.name: Loop-the-Loop Coaster
thrill.description: An adrenaline-packed roller coaster with multiple inversions and steep drops.

thrill.name: Twister
thrill.description: A high-speed coaster that twists and turns through tight spirals.

thrill.name: G-Force
thrill.description: An intense ride that simulates the high G-forces of fighter jet maneuvers.

thrill.name: The Cyclone
thrill.description: A classic wooden coaster that offers a nostalgic yet thrilling ride experience.

water.name: Splash River
water.description: A relaxing raft ride down a gently flowing river with occasional light rapids.

water.name: Torrential Falls
water.description: A log flume ride with steep drops and a big splash.

water.name: Misty Geyser
water.description: A ride that shoots you up with water jets before a splashdown return.

water.name: Wave Rider
water.description: A high-speed boat ride that skims across a water track with sharp turns.

water.name: The Soaker
water.description: A water coaster with dips and dives that will leave you soaked.

family.name: Merry-Go-Round
family.description: A classic carousel ride that's perfect for all ages.

family.name: Ferris Wheel
family.description: Take in the sights from the top of this gentle giant wheel.

family.name: Magic Train
family.description: A scenic train ride around the park, great for young children and families.

family.name: Jungle Trek
family.description: A slow-paced ride through a jungle landscape, featuring animatronic animals.

family.name: Space Adventure
family.description: A space-themed ride that takes you on a tour of the cosmos.

dining.name: Burger Joint
dining.description: A classic burger restaurant with a variety of toppings and sides.

menu.description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.
Grilled chicken breast topped with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.
Crispy golden fries seasoned with salt.
Battered and deep-fried onion rings served with dipping sauce.

dining.name: Pizza Paradise
dining.description: A pizza restaurant with a wide selection of toppings and specialty pizzas.

menu.description: Classic pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomato sauce, and basil.
Traditional pizza topped with pepperoni slices and melted cheese.
Toasted bread topped with garlic butter and herbs.
Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing with croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

dining.name: Sushi Bar
dining.description: A sushi restaurant offering a variety of fresh sushi rolls and sashimi.

menu.description: Crab meat, avocado, and cucumber wrapped in sushi rice and seaweed.
Tuna mixed with spicy mayo and wrapped in sushi rice and seaweed.
Fresh slices of raw salmon served with soy sauce and wasabi.
Traditional Japanese soup made with soybean paste, tofu, and seaweed.

dining.name: Mexican Grill
dining.description: A Mexican restaurant serving flavorful tacos, burritos, and more.

menu.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with grilled chicken, onions, cilantro, and salsa.
Large flour tortilla filled with seasoned beef, rice, beans, cheese, and salsa.
Freshly made avocado dip with tomatoes, onions, and lime juice.
Crispy fried dough sticks dusted with cinnamon sugar.
Classic Mexican cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec.

events.name: ThrillFest 2024
events.description: Experience the ultimate adrenaline rush at ThrillFest 2024! Join us for a day filled with heart-pounding rides, thrilling attractions, and non-stop excitement. Get your blood pumping on the fastest roller coasters, challenge yourself on daring drop towers, and enjoy live entertainment and delicious food. Don't miss this unforgettable event that will leave you screaming for more!

events.name: Fantasy World Parade
events.description: Step into a world of magic and wonder at the Fantasy World Parade! Immerse yourself in a whimsical spectacle of enchanting floats, colorful costumes, and captivating performances. Witness your favorite fairytale characters come to life as they march through the park, spreading joy and happiness. Join us for a day of imagination, laughter, and unforgettable memories!
